EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Other_CN_Welcome Email_Q115.02 Auto Responder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal产品信息
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
尊敬{{lead.Full Name:default=edit me}}
感谢您对Pivotal产品信息感兴趣，请点以下连接：
• 关于Pivotal <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/1.%20zmPivotal.pdf>
• Pivotal 介绍 <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/2.%20Pivotal%20vn.pdf>
• Pivotal GemFire <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/3.%20Pivotal%20Gemfire.pdf>
• Pivotal GemFire: 解决方案 <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/4.%20Pivotal_GemFire%20rlpu.pdf>
• Pivotal GREENPLUM Database <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/5.%20Pivotal_Greenplum_Database.pdf>
• EMC GREENPLUM 新一代数据库云平台 <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/6.%20EMC%20GREENPLUM%20gatuafpzm-New.pdf>
• Pivotal Data Science Labs <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/7.%20Pivotal_Data_Science_Labs.pdf>
• Pivotal Data Computing Application (DCA) <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/8.%20Pivotal_DCA.pdf>
• Pivotal HD Enterprise <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/9.%20Pivotal_HD_Enterprise.pdf>
